(Once again, I apologize for taking so long to post. I have been told that 
the battle at the CF is over, and currently the CF is not under attack.)


Hysteria/Tavatron/Swyft(New Character)

Hysteria lay sprawled out on her stomach atop the CF. She painstakingly 
worked on trying to keep the shields from failing all together:

"Just a few more..."

Hystera yelped as a small jolt of electricity ran through her body.

*****

Tavatron:

Tavatron groaned softly, her hand instinctively clutching her injured side. 
The armor had not only been melded to her circuitry, but ripped from her 
shoulder as well. The result was a mechfluid loss that left her lightheaded 
and feeling extremely tired. Tavatron slowly sank to one knee. She just 
needed a few moments to regain her strength. Only a few...

Tav chuckled in the back of her host's mind. How pitiful she must look, 
kneeling in the midst of a battle. The hate and anger that echoed with each 
demented thought would have chilled even Dinobot's cold spark if he had been 
capable of sensing it. However, Tavatron was. She could only moan softly, 
the mechfluid forming a growing puddle of silver liquid at her feet. 
Tavatron sat back a bit, leaning against her free arm for support. There she 
sat in a puddle of fluid that had begun to slow in its growth, but still 
grew.

"Shut up..." Tavatron whispered weakly.

*****

From deep within space flew a stasis pod. It crashed through stray rocks and 
pecies of metal as it flew past the previous site of the Ark battle and hit 
the Earth's atmosphere at a fantastic speed. It's rate didn't slow, but in 
fact increased until it was nothing more than a burning blur in the sky. The 
pod would have quickly overheated if it had not broken through the 
atmosphere and foud it's way to a great body of water. It crashed and sank 
nearly to the bottom before its flotation device activated and it began to 
resurface.

The pod bobbed on the surface of the rippling water, the DNA scan active but 
finding nothing suitable. Then a small creature cried out as it dove toward 
the pod. THe blue bird quickly realized that the new addition to its habitat 
was not eadible, and pulled up as it flew out of site. That was enough, 
however, to provide the 'bot within the pod a form.

The pod opened with a lou HISS as the bot within sat up and stretched. She 
took a moment to realize where she was before turning to gaze at the large 
base beside her.(The Iron Fist)She then turned her attention to her 
reflection in the  now still water:

"Now this, I can live with."

Swyft smiled as she continued to admire herself in the glassy water.

(See the characters page for Swyft's stats)
